name: Car Dash - PyGame Creation
description:
This is a car racing/dodging game created by a 13-year-old child with PyGame. Dash the car through the roads while dodging other cars, lasers and collecting coins to buy powerups.

Please appreciate the child's effort by donating some money.

The game is in development stages. There could be many bugs/glitches so please don't get frustrated. And bug fixes/more updates will be coming soon.
